entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle becoming mixed with drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 07:14 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle becoming mixed with light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 07:14 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
